Prop.Name: ExecuteEnter
Prop.Description: True if the Enter event should be executed before leaving the page.

Prop.Name: ShowMessage
Prop.Description: True if a dialog box should appear giving users the option to stay on the current page.

Prop.Name: Message
Prop.Default: Are you sure you want to leave this page without saving your changes?
Prop.Description: A message to show when the dialog box appears giving users the option to stay on the current page. Not all browsers show the message as this mechanism is not standard.
